item.title: Chad Michael Collins Gives Deadly Order In Sniper: The Last Stand Clip [EXCLUSIVE]
item.description: Exclusive: ScreenRant presents a clip from Danishka Esterhazy's new action film, Sniper: The Last Stand, starring Chad Michael Collins.

item.title: Mufasa: The Lion King Steals Keke Palmer Comedy's #1 Spot As Wolf Man & Den Of Thieves 2 Stumble - Weekend Box Office Recap
item.description: Mufasa: The Lion King took #1 by upsetting Keke Palmer's One of Them Days, while Wolf Man and Den of Thieves 2 stumbled at the weekend box office.

item.title: The Sequel To Ridley Scott's Epic Movie From 2000 Is Now Streaming On Paramount+, And It Features A Can't-Miss Performance By Denzel Washington
item.description: Ridley Scott's long-awaited sequel Gladiator II is now streaming on Paramount+, and Denzel Washington's scene-stealing turn should not be missed.
